name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Woman1;You...|I gave your army that staff.|I helped you.
speak;Woman1;And now General Selena is dead.|She's dead because of you!|Because of your army!
speak;Woman1;Sorry?|Sorry?!|She protected this village!|She kept us safe!|And I...I helped the people who killed her.|How can I live with that?
speak;Woman1;Just...just go.|I don't want to see you anymore.|Get out of my sight.
